FHE resources

A curated list of resources about Fully Homomorphic Encryption.

FHE Libraries

  • ðŸ’» Concrete - Rust FHE library that implements Zamaâ€™s variant of TFHE.
  • ðŸ’» HElib - BGV scheme with bootstrapping and the Approximate Number CKKS scheme.
  • ðŸ’» Lattigo - lattice-based multiparty homomorphic encryption library in Go.
  • ðŸ’» OpenFHE - OpenFHE is an open-source FHE library that includes efficient implementations of common FHE schemes.
  • ðŸ’» PALISADE - C++ FHE library that supports all the major FHE protocols.
  • ðŸ’» SEAL - C++ FHE library implementing BFV and CKKS schemes.
